How to Play: Roll dice to strengthen and expand your empire.

Citizenry: Used dice the run your Empire.

Phase Selection: Only players selected phases will happen.
Move any one worker to any Phase on strip.

Reassign: If developed, reassign workers to different phase.
Reassign power works once per round.
All players may Reassign to Dictate

Dicate: Reassign a different worker to a different phase.
Dictated worker will end up in the cup.

Phases (General): In order execute each phase step.

SCOUT (or Stock): Draw 1 more tile than abandoned from the bag.
Place it in the construction zone.

Abandon: Put abandoned tile under Explore Phase tile.
After Explore phase return abandoned tiles to bag.
Keep developers and settlers on stack.
If developers complete a tile, don't complete until Develop/Settle phase.

2. Develop: Put worker on development construction zone stack.
Complete if Workers = Cost of top development.

Complete: If construction zone is empty, return Worker to cup.

3. Settle: Put worker on world construction zone stack.
If effect removes dice, select any location.
Complete if Workers = Cost of World.

4. Produce: Each Worker becomes 1 good on non-gray World.
Any color worker becomes a good.
Matching world color applies to Consume.

5. Shipping: Each Worker Trades or Consumes a good.
Both Ship and Good Worker move to Citizenry.

Consume: If there aren't enough VP tokens, use the set aside 10VP. Trigger EOG.

Recall: Freely return any construction zone Worker to cup.

Reset: Flip Phase used Phase tiles back to 'X'.

Check EOG: B. Player has 12 tiles in tableu.

Most VP: VP per completed developments and worlds.
